meanings.definition: To present voluntarily and without expecting compensation
meanings.sent1: She gives her time to help others in need.
meanings.sent2: He gives his friend a birthday gift every year.
meanings.sent3: The generous donor gives to charity regularly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile gives warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The teacher gives knowledge to eager students.

meanings.definition: To transfer possession or control of something to someone else
meanings.sent1: The owner gives the keys to the new tenant.
meanings.sent2: He gives his old bike to his younger brother.
meanings.sent3: The magician gives the wand to the amazed child.
meanings.sent4: The captain gives the command to set sail.
meanings.sent5: The parent gives responsibility to the growing child.

meanings.definition: To yield or produce something as a result of effort or work
meanings.sent1: The tree gives delicious fruits every summer.
meanings.sent2: Hard work gives good results in the end.
meanings.sent3: The oven gives off a wonderful smell of baking bread.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush gives life to the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The sun gives light and warmth to the earth.
